lead_paragraph: A new policy is expected to ban those with naturally high testosterone levels from women’s competitions, pawning a social question off onto scientists, the authors argue.
snippet: A new policy is expected to ban those with naturally high testosterone levels from women’s competitions, pawning a social question off onto scientists, the authors argue.
